content:
It's time to get egg-static!

Sign up now to join us on Easter Sunday as we launch our 4th annual Great Easter Rate Hunt, your chance to score one of 80+ incredible discounts (including $1.00 room rates!).    What is The Great Easter Rate Hunt?                                  Basically, it's like an Easter egg hunt, but with super cheap hotel rates! Every year on Easter Sunday, we host an online competition where registered participants hunt our website for one of 80+ super discounted room rates, some at $1.00 and others at $99!                          When does the Great Easter Rate Hunt begin?              On Easter morning, we send an email to all registered participants with the official start time!                                What are my chances of winning?                                      Once the competition begins, over 80 incredible discounts of either $1.00 or $99 across a variety of room types (yes, even our Ocean Front rooms!) will be available to find and then book on our website.                How long does the hunt last?                                                It depends! We will announce the end of the competition via Facebook once all 80+ room rates have been booked. In previous years, the hunt has ended in as little as 20 minutes!                                                              What are the rules?                                                                After registering for the competition by joining our email list below, you will soon receive an email with tips for success, rules and on Easter Sunday, the official start time!                                                                                           How do I register?                                                          Simply join our email list (below) and like us on Facebook!                                                                            Happy Hunting!

We've hidden over 85 rates ranging from $1 to $99
